mainPackage

Class TaskRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.TaskRunner

  • public class TaskRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskRunner class is a singleton class that can run tasks.
    Author:
    razvan

      • moveHeroToDirection

        private boolean moveHeroToDirection(Hero hero,
                                    Maze maze,
                                    Direction direction)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Move hero on a certain direction and put the new coordinates in a file.
        Parameters:
        hero - the hero, here Dubluve
        maze - the maze generated
        direction - next direction where hero should go
        Returns:
        if we have a win or keep finding the exit portal
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems while writing on file

      • checkWin

        private boolean checkWin(Maze m,
                         Hero h)
        Check if the hero has reached the exit portal.
        Parameters:
        m - the maze
        h - the hero
        Returns:
        whether hero has reached the exit portal or not

      • runTask

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> runTask(int task,
                                                      Maze m,
                                                      Hero h)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Run a task given as parameter. It move the hero using AI or computing the shortest path to the finish. If the hero cannot reach the finish, a message will be printed. It returns a list of cells visited by the hero.
        Parameters:
        task - the number of task
        m - the maze
        h - the hero
        Returns:
        a list of cells visited by the hero
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems while writing to file

      • printArrayToFile

        private void printArrayToFile(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> string,
                              java.io.BufferedWriter fileWriter)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Prints the output given as an array of strings, each string per line, in a given file.
        Parameters:
        string - an array of strings
        fileWriter - file buffer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there are problems while writing in file

      • run

        public void run()
        This method opens the output file stream, creates a hero and a maze from a given file from arguments list and prints the path of the hero up to exit portal.
